last_episode_to_air.name: The Artic Story
last_episode_to_air.overview: The crew of Sealab ventures into the frozen Arctic to rescue two scientists who have been trapped by a blizzard while on a scientific expedition.

name: Sealab 2020
overview: Sealab 2020 is an American animated television series produced by Hanna-Barbera. The show premiered on NBC on September 9, 1972. The series aired its 13th and final episode on December 2, 1972, with three episodes unaired. As with most Hanna-Barbera series, the show is in occasional rotation on Boomerang, the TV channel that owns the Hanna-Barbera archives.

episodes.name: Deep Threat
episodes.overview: An earthquake spells danger for Sealab when the recurring mass of shock waves ruptures exposed canisters of radioactive waste.

episodes.name: Lost
episodes.overview: An approaching red tide has more than the fish in a panic - the murky oceanic flux, which initiates a process of oxygen depleting, could cut off the life support system of Sealab.

episodes.name: Green Fever
episodes.overview: A red alert is signaled after a supply ship's concrete mooring, cast off during a hurricane, unwittingly strikes Sealab's control dome and splits a major section of the shell.

episodes.name: The Singing Whale
episodes.overview: A new world opens up for Roger Cummings, a disabled boy whose father is doing research at Sealab, when Bobby befriends him and teaches him how to dive.

episodes.name: The Shark Lover
episodes.overview: The entire Sealab complex is threatened by an increasing buildup of aggressive sharks in the area.

episodes.name: The Basking Shark
episodes.overview: When a space probe loses its parachute during reentry and plummets out of sight into the ocean's depths, the staff of Sealab is called on to locate it.

episodes.name: Where Dangers Are Many
episodes.overview: Ed, Gail, and Hal become "muckrakers" when ocean waters around Sealab become blanketed with layers of loosened silt

episodes.name: Backfire
episodes.overview: Ed considers resigning from Sealab after Dr. Williams grants permission to a submarine geologist to use explosives on Seamount for the purpose of oil exploration.

episodes.name: The Deepest Dive
episodes.overview: Hal, Ed, and Gail plunge to the lowest depths of the ocean in a special crystal bell to plant a second seismographic signaling device after the first one mysteriously disappears.

episodes.name: The Challenge
episodes.overview: An archaeologist enlists the aid of Hal, Ed, and Gail in removing ancient Mayan gold artifacts buried in the hold of a vessel sunk during WWI.

episodes.name: Collision of the Aquarius
episodes.overview: Human complications make dealing with the mechanical ones more difficult when cargo sub "Aquarius" crashes into Seamount and endangers the Sealab complex.

episodes.name: The Capture
episodes.overview: Although the Sealab crew doesn't like helping Mr. Harlan trap two animals from every species on the Seamount for a new aquarium, they carry out the task because of orders.

episodes.name: The Artic Story
episodes.overview: The crew of Sealab ventures into the frozen Arctic to rescue two scientists who have been trapped by a blizzard while on a scientific expedition.
